text: Pietro Pavan (30 August 1903 - 26 December 1994) was an Italian Cardinal of the Roman Catholic Church from 1985 until his death in 1994. He was appointed by John Paul II on 25 May 1985.http://www.catholic- hierarchy.org/bishop/bpavan.html He helped draft the papal encyclical Pacem in terris. ==References== Category:1903 births Category:1994 deaths Category:Cardinals created by Pope John Paul II Category:Italian cardinals Category:Italian Roman Catholics Category:People from Treviso Category:Pontifical Gregorian University alumni Category:University of Padua alumni Category:20th-century Italian Roman Catholic priests
